body: Hello everyone, I tried to followed the tutorial video "11 - Honeybee Energy Modeling - The Laws of Geometry in E+ Part 3_ Curved Geometry", but the "glazingCreator" couldn't calculate the glazing.  If anyone can help me? Thanks in advance. Roy [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/dM9WbuK-4Ra*NDpIz5YpLzduvSMkFbo-anYDDIg*okNz3GmO4scczODZkli99mzSCLIFPHxPq8zaBMj4IX2U*xcdeIxLMySq/11.png)
topic: A question about "glazingCreator” on a curved geometry

replies.body: Yi, Your file is working for me: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/ycvwLIslca7NoYmQhyrpnbBhwLTxPScAAEWm-IMML1cPc5PAvRtiK3HYl8tYGkQbP6mrJw6NfDfTo6DTxTf1UAzRNeem24Sl/CurvedSurfsWorking.JPG) Make sure that your rhino model is in meters and that your Rhino tolerance is small enough.  Then recompute the GH canvas and it should work. -Chris
